alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Coffee (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Coffee and southeastern Bedford Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 429 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shelbyville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shelbyville, Manchester, Tullahoma, Wartrace, Normandy and Raus. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 104 and 114. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
